abstract: Authorities commend Suffolk County police officer for fatally shooting shoplifting suspect Denzel Brown as he tried to carjack vehicle with two children in it.
lead_paragraph: Denzel Brown, 21, was shot by a Suffolk County police officer after he shoplifted headphones, tried to steal two cars and got into a third, the authorities said.

headline.main: Officer Lauded for Killing Man Who Tried to Steal Car With 2 Boys Inside
headline.print_headline: Officer Lauded for Killing Man Who Tried to Steal Car With 2 Boys Inside

snippet: Denzel Brown, 21, was shot by a Suffolk County police officer after he shoplifted headphones, tried to steal two cars and got into a third, the authorities said.
